name: ROBOCOCK
description:
RoboCock is a fast paced shooter inspired by Devil Daggers. You'll attempt to survive the everlasting onslaught of very very very scary demons. You play as a robot chicken who was sent to hell for his many wrongdoings. Now you only have one purpose. KILL!!!

Gameplay Features;
• Intense nonstop chicken action
• Collect powerups to increase your chicken capabilities
• Launch your fellow brethren from your mother (the chicken in your hand)
• Smooth fluid movement
• Seek new records
• Fight your demons
• Beak-air-full this world is unforgiving
